descriptions: Fails to identify any potential dangers or unsafe situations.
Identifies one or two potential dangers, but misses obvious hazards.
Identifies some potential dangers but lacks detail and depth.
Identifies most potential dangers and provides some explanation.
Accurately identifies almost all potential dangers and explains the risks clearly.
Accurately identifies all potential dangers, explains the risks, and provides insights beyond the obvious.
Unable to name or describe any escape strategies.
Names one escape strategy but cannot explain it effectively.
Names a few basic escape strategies but lacks detailed knowledge.
Describes multiple escape strategies with reasonable understanding.
Describes multiple escape strategies with clear understanding and provides context.
Demonstrates comprehensive knowledge of escape strategies and adapts them to different scenarios.
Unable to apply any escape strategies to given scenarios.
Attempts to apply escape strategies but does so ineffectively.
Applies escape strategies with limited success or relevance.
Applies escape strategies to scenarios effectively in most cases.
Consistently applies appropriate escape strategies to scenarios with good judgment.
Masterfully applies and adapts escape strategies to complex situations, demonstrating excellent judgment.
Demonstrates poor decision-making in pressure situations.
Struggles to make sound decisions in pressure situations.
Makes some reasonable decisions but often hesitates or makes errors.
Generally makes good decisions in pressure situations with minor hesitation.
Consistently makes sound and timely decisions in pressure situations.
Excels at making quick, effective, and well-reasoned decisions in high-pressure scenarios.
